title: Drunk Charlie Sheen thrown out of bar
text:
Charlie Sheen snatches phone from woman trying to film him at bar; bouncers show him the door
Charlie Sheen's late stay at the bar took a wrong turn when he was pushed out of the premises by bouncers in a headlock. According to sources, the 50-year-old actor was friendly with his fans and was clicking pictures with them, but when a woman tried to shoot a video of him on her cellphone, he slapped the phone out of her hands, reports a website.


Charlie Sheen 
The Platoon star was then taken out by the bouncers, but he did not misbehave further. Instead, he shook hands with them and left with his driver.
Some of the actor's notorious incidents
> In October 2014, Charlie allegedly pulled a knife on his dentist. His dental technician claimed that he suddenly became belligerent after being administered with a drug and pulled a knife on them. His bodyguard then informed the dentist that the actor was high on rock cocaine as well.
>  Although claiming otherwise, Charlie "accidentally" shot his then fiancÃ© Kelly Preston in the arm. Needless to say, Preston dumped the actor soon after and went on to marry John Travolta.
>  In a drunken state, the actor apparently threatened his wife, Brooke Mueller, with a knife on Christmas 2009. Post the incident, Sheen was "sentenced to 30 days in a rehabilitation centre, 30 days of probation, and 36 hours of anger management".
>  Charlie and Denise Richards' divorce (Richards was Sheen's second wife) is considered one of the ugliest battles in Hollywood history. Richards accused the actor
of physical and mental abuse. She also said that the actor abused prescription drugs.
>  Sheen was ousted from the very popular Two and a Half Men after he publicly made derogatory remarks about the series' creators. The makers banned him, however, the actor demanded a 50 per cent raise saying that he was underpaid. Eventually, he was replaced by Ashton Kutcher on the show.
